DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial Repeated Hands-and-Knees Positioning During Labour
DOC.detailed_description: Women enrol pilot randomize control trial two hospital , one Canada one USA . Nurses hospital train assist woman hands-and-knees position bed . Repeated hands-and-knees position define attempt use position 15 minute , hourly randomization delivery . Women ask assume hands-and-knees delivery .
